detectors.description:

	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1157)

Reentrancy in RewardCampaign.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1572-1577):
	External calls:
	- getReward(msg.sender) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1575)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#524)
		- rewardsToken.safeTransfer(arcDAO,daoPayable) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1547)
		- rewardsToken.safeTransfer(user,payableAmount.sub(daoPayable)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1548)
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1576)
		- stakingToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1567)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#524)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1576)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1564)
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1576)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1103)
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1576)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = actualRewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1102)
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1576)
		- stakers[msg.sender].balance = stakers[msg.sender].balance.sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1565)
		- stakers[account].rewardsEarned = actualEarned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1106)
		- stakers[account].rewardPerTokenPaid = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardCampaign__1.sol#1107)
